job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Are you someone who connects the unconnectable? Pioneers new technology and innovation tech with modern thinking? Do you have a copy of CODE COMPLETE book written by Steve McConnell next to your night stand? Then keep reading because our&nbsp;<strong>Software Developer</strong>&nbsp;position could be just the role for you!</p><p>*</p><p><strong>Job in a nutshell:</strong></p><p>Develop software to integrate with internal back-end systems.</p><p><strong>Snapshot of what else you will do:</strong></p><ul><li>Analyze information to determine, recommend, and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system</li><li>Analyze software requirements to determine feasibility</li><li>Confer with business analyst to design systems and to obtain information on project limitations and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces</li><li>Implement integrations between software</li><li>Deploy updates and fixes</li><li>Investigate and resolve technical issues</li><li>Develop procedures and tools to reduce occurrences of errors and improve customer experience</li><li>Document integrations and flows</li></ul><p><strong>As a small growing business you will help in these areas:</strong></p><ul><li>Provide level 2 technical support</li><li>Assess server setup and usage</li><li>Modify software programs to improve performance</li><li>Improve automation</li><li>Monitor and improve networks and servers</li></ul><p><strong>What we are looking for:</strong></p><ul><li>BS in Computer Science, Information technology or related field required. Equivalent work experience and education in lieu of a degree will be considered</li><li>4 years Software Development/Engineering or relevant work experience required</li><li>Experience in JavaScript, PHP and cloud based infrastructure (AWS strongly desired)</li><li>Working knowledge of databases and MySQL</li><li>Strong curiosity and problem-solving attitude</li><li>Self-motivated, accountable, and team mentality</li><li>Knowledge of Laravel, Livewire, Tailwind and Salesforce a plus</li></ul><p><strong>Who we are:</strong></p><p>At&nbsp;<strong>Pattern</strong>, we have a passion for helping doctors. We believe, as doctors and our team make better decisions, lives are changed.&nbsp;<strong>Tech plays a major role in helping our team’s success and serving our clients.&nbsp;</strong>At&nbsp;<strong>Pattern</strong>, we have a Fun-fessional culture. Don’t let the Fun fool you. We are growing fast and have big goals! We perform at a high level and like having fun together while doing it.&nbsp;<em>Still interested?</em>&nbsp;<strong>GREAT! APPLY NOW</strong>, we would love to learn more about you!</p>
